job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pThe Machine Learning Engineering team at Ampersand is seeking a ML Engineer focused on productionizing Bayesian models developed by the Data Science group Samples of the types of model output you will be working with may be found in the example notebooks of our open source repository PyMC3HMM ppbrppstrongemuhttpsgithubcomampersandtvpymc3hmmuemstrongppbrppIn our experience there is not necessarily a specific background common to ML Engineers so here are a few of the different responsibilities you might take on pulliExtend the open source Aesara and PyMC3HMM packages liliDevelop tools to visualize model results using Matplotlib liliWrite and optimize Clickhouse SQL queries and design relational schemas for efficient storage and computation liliUse Github actions to create Docker images for use by AWS Batch as part of our production pipeline liliDesign custom metadata services to manage the state of our model fitsliulpstrongRequirementsstrongpulliIntermediate to advanced knowledge of PythonliliSignificant experience working on a collaborative team using gitbased workflows and continuous integrationliulpstrongNice to HavestrongppIt will be easier to convince us to hire you if have open source contributions blog posts or public  projects we can evaluate Of course we recognize that not everyone has the opportunity to work on these kinds of projects so they are in no way a requirementp
